casebody.data:
HAROLD L. VALENTINE, Inc., Libellant-Appellant, v. The PENNSYLVANIA RAILROAD COMPANY, Respondent-Appellee. No. 153. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 23, 1939. Purdy & Lamb, of New York City (Edmund F. Lamb and John E. Purdy, both of New York City, of counsel), for libellant-appellant. Burlingham, Veeder, Clark & Hupper, of New York City (Chauncey I. Clark and Frederic Conger, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
